title: CKA Exercises
description: Prepare for the CKA by working through these exam-focused exercises.

items.title: Kubernetes Upgrade Process
items.description: Use kubeadm to upgrade control plane and worker nodes in Kubernetes

items.title: Kubernetes Node Upgrade Procedure
items.description: The node is experiencing a memory leak and requires maintenance. Disable scheduling and evict the pods.

items.title: Implement Taints and Tolerations on node01
items.description: Create a taint on node01 and configure a toleration in a pod so that it can be scheduled on that node.

items.title: Backup and Restore the etcd Cluster
items.description: Create a reliable etcd backup and perform a restoration to recover a simulated failed cluster.

items.title: Implementing Storage Classes and Dynamic Volume Provisioning
items.description: A company requires a dynamically provisioned persistent volume for a web application that stores its logs on a storage backend
